name: railway
description:
The railway command extracts railway lines, stations, and infrastructure from OSM data. It includes:

- Rail, light rail, subway, tram lines
- Stations, halts, and stops
- Track properties (gauge, electrification)
- Operator and network information

Calculates total network length.

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)
options.--type: Railway type: rail, light_rail, subway, tram, all (default: all)

output:
Railway features with:

For lines:
- railway: Type (rail, tram, subway, etc.)
- name, ref: Line identification
- operator: Rail operator
- electrified, gauge, tracks: Technical details
- maxspeed: Speed limit
- length_m: Line segment length

For stations:
- type: station, halt, stop
- name, ref: Station identification
- platforms: Number of platforms
